General.Name: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a software development company in Turkey. The company develops integrated business application software that covers various accounting, production, and commercial operational requirements. Its software products include modules for tracking sales, marketing, purchasing, inventory management, warehouse-store management, current accounts, finance, accounting, production, budget planning, human resources, and fixed assets operations. The company also offers sales and after sales training, and support services through a network of approximately 500 authorized resellers and dealers. It distributes its products through distributor and business partner companies. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
